original_title: Metalmeccanico e parrucchiera in un turbine di sesso e di politica
overview: During the general elections of 1994, Tunin, a mechanic with a firm belief in communism fears that his party is about to lose,  so he journeys to a northern village to stir up trouble. He isn't there long before he is arguing with a beautiful hairdresser. Their debate is fiery as is his growing and impossible-to-disguise passion for her. She too is intrigued with him, but their disparate ideologies threaten to keep them apart.
title: The Blue Collar Worker and the Hairdresser in a Whirl of Sex and Politics
